movies.overview: Following the events of Age of Ultron, the collective governments of the world pass an act designed to regulate all superhuman activity. This polarizes opinion amongst the Avengers, causing two factions to side with Iron Man or Captain America, which causes an epic battle between former allies.
movies.tagline: Divided We Fall
movies.title: Captain America: Civil War

movies.overview: Since the dawn of civilization, he was worshipped as a god. Apocalypse, the first and most powerful mutant from Marvel’s X-Men universe, amassed the powers of many other mutants, becoming immortal and invincible. Upon awakening after thousands of years, he is disillusioned with the world as he finds it and recruits a team of powerful mutants, including a disheartened Magneto, to cleanse mankind and create a new world order, over which he will reign. As the fate of the Earth hangs in the balance, Raven with the help of Professor X must lead a team of young X-Men to stop their greatest nemesis and save mankind from complete destruction.
movies.tagline: Only the strong will survive
movies.title: X-Men: Apocalypse

movies.overview: Based upon Marvel Comics’ most unconventional anti-hero, DEADPOOL tells the origin story of former Special Forces operative turned mercenary Wade Wilson, who after being subjected to a rogue experiment that leaves him with accelerated healing powers, adopts the alter ego Deadpool. Armed with his new abilities and a dark, twisted sense of humor, Deadpool hunts down the man who nearly destroyed his life.
movies.tagline: Witness the beginning of a happy ending
movies.title: Deadpool

movies.original_title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice
movies.overview: Fearing the actions of a god-like Super Hero left unchecked, Gotham City’s own formidable, forceful vigilante takes on Metropolis’s most revered, modern-day savior, while the world wrestles with what sort of hero it really needs. And with Batman and Superman at war with one another, a new threat quickly arises, putting mankind in greater danger than it’s ever known before.
movies.tagline: Justice or revenge
movies.title: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice

movies.overview: An island populated entirely by happy, flightless birds or almost entirely. In this paradise, Red, a bird with a temper problem, speedy Chuck, and the volatile Bomb have always been outsiders. But when the island is visited by mysterious green piggies, it’s up to these unlikely outcasts to figure out what the pigs are up to.
movies.tagline: Why so angry?
movies.title: The Angry Birds Movie

movies.overview: Lee Gates is a TV personality whose insider tips have made him the money guru of Wall Street. When Kyle loses all of his family's money on a bad tip, he holds Lee and his entire show hostage on air threatening to kill Lee if he does not get the stock up 24 and a half points before the bell.
movies.tagline: Not every conspiracy is a theory.
movies.title: Money Monster

movies.overview: A man is out for justice after a group of corrupt police officers are unable to catch his wife's killer.
movies.tagline: I lay my vengeance upon them.
movies.title: I Am Wrath

movies.overview: A sorority moves in next door to the home of Mac and Kelly Radner who have a young child. The Radner's enlist their former nemeses from the fraternity to help battle the raucous sisters.
movies.tagline: New neighbors.
movies.title: Neighbors 2: Sorority Rising

movies.overview: Assigned to recover sensitive stolen data, a gruff FBI agent goes undercover as a kindergarten teacher, but the school's liberal, politically correct environment is more than he bargained for.
movies.title: Kindergarten Cop 2

movies.overview: A private eye investigates the apparent suicide of a fading porn star in 1970s Los Angeles and uncovers a conspiracy.
movies.tagline: Nice pair
movies.title: The Nice Guys

movies.original_title: Mortadello e Polpetta contro Jimmy lo sguercio
movies.title: Mortadello e Polpetta contro Jimmy lo sguercio

movies.overview: Dr. Robert Laing (Hiddlestone) is the newest resident of a luxurious apartment in a high-tech concrete skyscraper whose lofty location places him amongst the upper class. Laing quickly settles into high-society life and meets the building’s eccentric tenants: Charlotte (Miller), his upstairs neighbor and bohemian single mother; Wilder (Evans), a charismatic documentarian who lives with his pregnant wife Helen (Moss); and Mr. Royal (Irons), the enigmatic architect who designed the building. Life seems like paradise to the solitude-seeking Laing. But as power outages become more frequent and building flaws emerge, particularly on the lower floors, the regimented social strata begins to crumble and the building becomes a battlefield in a literal class war.
movies.tagline: Leave the real world behind
movies.title: High-Rise

movies.overview: A pair of cops investigating a drug invasion stumble upon a mysterious bank vault.
movies.tagline: Bad cops make the best criminals
movies.title: The Trust

movies.original_title: Tini: El Gran Cambio de Violetta
movies.overview: Shot in Spanish and localized for markets around the world, “Tini – El Gran Cambio de Violetta” is set to thrill fans with everything they loved about the worldwide Violetta phenomenon including strong musical elements with new and original tracks, exciting choreography, compelling storylines, and intriguing characters. All made bigger and better for the big screen. The film shows how taking the role in the TV series was a pivotal moment for Tini leading to a personal ‘coming of age story’ about the young actress. In a story that reflects the teen star’s own real life, Tini will leave behind the world depicted in Violetta, striking out alone and embarking on a brand new adventure over one endless summer that will define her as a person and see her emerge as a new artist.
movies.title: Tini: El Gran Cambio de Violetta

movies.overview: In the sequel to Tim Burton's "Alice in Wonderland", Alice Kingsleigh returns to Underland and faces a new adventure in saving the Mad Hatter.
movies.tagline: It's time for a little madness.
movies.title: Alice Through the Looking Glass

movies.overview: The peaceful realm of Azeroth stands on the brink of war as its civilization faces a fearsome race of invaders: orc warriors fleeing their dying home to colonize another. As a portal opens to connect the two worlds, one army faces destruction and the other faces extinction. From opposing sides, two heroes are set on a collision course that will decide the fate of their family, their people, and their home.
movies.tagline: Two worlds. One home.
movies.title: Warcraft

movies.overview: One year after outwitting the FBI and winning the public’s adulation with their mind-bending spectacles, the Four Horsemen resurface in Now You See Me: The Second Act only to find themselves face to face with a new enemy who enlists them to pull off their most dangerous heist yet.
movies.title: Now You See Me 2

movies.original_title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
movies.overview: The Turtles return to save the city from a dangerous threat.
movies.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows

movies.overview: Under the direction of a ruthless instructor, a talented young drummer begins to pursue perfection at any cost, even his humanity.
movies.tagline: The road to greatness can take you to the edge.
movies.title: Whiplash

movies.overview: Framed in the 1940s for the double murder of his wife and her lover, upstanding banker Andy Dufresne begins a new life at the Shawshank prison, where he puts his accounting skills to work for an amoral warden. During his long stretch in prison, Dufresne comes to be admired by the other inmates -- including an older prisoner named Red -- for his integrity and unquenchable sense of hope.
movies.tagline: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption

movies.overview: The story spans the years from 1945 to 1955 and chronicles the fictional Italian-American Corleone crime family. When organized crime family patriarch Vito Corleone barely survives an attempt on his life, his youngest son, Michael, steps in to take care of the would-be killers, launching a campaign of bloody revenge.
movies.tagline: An offer you can't refuse.
movies.title: The Godfather

movies.overview: Interstellar chronicles the adventures of a group of explorers who make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.
movies.tagline: Mankind was born on Earth. It was never meant to die here.
movies.title: Interstellar

movies.overview: An urban office worker finds that paper airplanes are instrumental in meeting a girl in ways he never expected.
movies.tagline: Delicate, charming and sweet.
movies.title: Paperman

movies.overview: A true story of two men who should never have met - a quadriplegic aristocrat who was injured in a paragliding accident and a young man from the projects.
movies.tagline: Sometimes you have to reach into someone else's world to find out what's missing in your own.
movies.title: The Intouchables

movies.overview: Jack is a young boy of 5 years old who has lived all his life in one room. He believes everything within it are the only real things in the world. But what will happen when his Ma suddenly tells him that there are other things outside of Room?
movies.tagline: Love knows no boundaries
movies.title: Room

movies.overview: The continuing saga of the Corleone crime family tells the story of a young Vito Corleone growing up in Sicily and in 1910s New York; and follows Michael Corleone in the 1950s as he attempts to expand the family business into Las Vegas, Hollywood and Cuba
movies.tagline: I don't feel I have to wipe everybody out, Tom. Just my enemies.
movies.title: The Godfather: Part II

movies.overview: In the latter part of World War II, a boy and his sister, orphaned when their mother is killed in the firebombing of Tokyo, are left to survive on their own in what remains of civilian life in Japan. The plot follows this boy and his sister as they do their best to survive in the Japanese countryside, battling hunger, prejudice, and pride in their own quiet, personal battle.
movies.tagline: At 4 and 14, they tried to live on
movies.title: Grave of the Fireflies

movies.overview: A touching story of an Italian book seller of Jewish ancestry who lives in his own little fairy tale. His creative and happy life would come to an abrupt halt when his entire family is deported to a concentration camp during World War II. While locked up he tries to convince his son that the whole thing is just a game.
movies.tagline: An unforgettable fable that proves love, family and imagination conquer all.
movies.title: Life Is Beautiful

movies.overview: This Oscar-winning animated short film tells the story of one man's love life as seen through the eyes of his best friend and dog, Winston, and revealed bite by bite through the meals they share.
movies.tagline: Pet is not just a pet
movies.title: Feast

movies.overview: A ticking-time-bomb insomniac and a slippery soap salesman channel primal male aggression into a shocking new form of therapy. Their concept catches on, with underground "fight clubs" forming in every town, until an eccentric gets in the way and ignites an out-of-control spiral toward oblivion.
movies.tagline: How much can you know about yourself if you've never been in a fight?
movies.title: Fight Club

movies.overview: Told from the perspective of businessman Oskar Schindler who saved over a thousand Jewish lives from the Nazis while they worked as slaves in his factory. Schindler’s List is based on a true story, illustrated in black and white and controversially filmed in many original locations.
movies.tagline: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.
movies.title: Schindler's List

movies.overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime. With the help of Lt. Jim Gordon and District Attorney Harvey Dent, Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague the streets. The partnership proves to be effective, but they soon find themselves prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known to the terrified citizens of Gotham as the Joker.
movies.tagline: Why So Serious?
movies.title: The Dark Knight

movies.overview: Light years from Earth, 26 years after being abducted, Peter Quill finds himself the prime target of a manhunt after discovering an orb wanted by Ronan the Accuser.
movies.tagline: All heroes start somewhere.
movies.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

movies.overview: A burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner, a drug-addled gangster's moll and a washed-up boxer converge in this sprawling, comedic crime caper. Their adventures unfurl in three stories that ingeniously trip back and forth in time.
movies.tagline: Just because you are a character doesn't mean you have character.
movies.title: Pulp Fiction
